title: Comfort Food
description: What if reaching for the familiar is holding you back from fulfillment? In “Comfort Food,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church shows us that, when we reach for what’s comfortable, we may actually be stunting our faith.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: What if reaching for the familiar is holding you back from fulfillment? In “Comfort Food,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church shows us that, when we reach for what’s comfortable, we may actually be stunting our faith.
